mapper.sql: SELECT id, user_id, menu_id, client_id FROM sys_perms_auth
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_perms_auth (id , user_id , menu_id , client_id ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.menuId}, #{item.clientId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.app_code AS id, a.name, '1' AS parentId FROM sys_app_client a LEFT JOIN sys_perms_auth b ON a.app_code = b.menu_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS parentId, a.title AS name FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_perms_auth b ON a.id = b.menu_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.order_num ASC
